question: Regression in Pytorch is implemented using nn.Linear(input_dim, output_dim). The input_dim and output_dim are ____ and ____ respectively.

answers.answer: input dimension of the image, number of class labels
answers.feedback: Yes, we use the input parameters for the nn.Linear layer is input dimension of the image and the output parameter is the number of class labels.

answers.answer: number of class labels, input dimension of the image
answers.feedback: No, we use the input parameters for the nn.Linear layer is input dimension of the image and the output parameter is the number of class labels

answers.answer: No paramters are required for nn.Linear.
